statements: UPDATE vehicle_performance_metrics SET speed = 60.5, fuel_level = 0.75 WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00';
UPDATE vehicle_performance_metrics SET engine_rpm = 2500 WHERE vehicle_id = 456 AND engine_temperature = 90.2;
UPDATE vehicle_performance_metrics SET speed = 60.5, engine_temperature = 90.7 WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND timestamp = '2022-09-15 08:30:00';
UPDATE vehicle_performance_metrics SET fuel_level = 45, engine_rpm = 2500 WHERE vehicle_id = 456 AND engine_temperature > 100.0;
UPDATE vehicle_metrics SET oil_pressure = 30.5, fuel_level = 75.2, engine_temperature = 90.3 WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
UPDATE maintenance_logs SET maintenance_description = 'Replaced oil filter and filled up engine oil.' WHERE log_id = 456;
UPDATE vehicle_metrics SET engine_temperature = 75.5, oil_pressure = 40.2 WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
UPDATE maintenance_logs SET maintenance_description = 'Changed oil and filter', maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance' WHERE vehicle_id = 456;
UPDATE vehicle_metrics SET engine_temperature = 80.5, fuel_level = 60.2 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE error_logs SET error_message = 'Engine overheating detected!' WHERE vehicle_id = 2;

UPDATE vehicles SET mileage = 15000 WHERE vehicle_id = 101
UPDATE performance_metrics SET speed = 60, fuel_consumption = 8.5 WHERE vehicle_id = 201
UPDATE vehicles SET make = 'Toyota', model = 'Camry', year = 2018, mileage = 50000, last_maintenance_date = '2021-08-20' WHERE vehicle_id = 1
UPDATE performance_metrics SET speed = 100, fuel_consumption = 9.5, engine_temperature = 80 WHERE metric_id = 5
